name: Way of All-Embracing
description:
Way of All-Embracing

In "Way of All-Embracing" it comes to a figure that, with your help passes through different levels in the universe. Your task is not only to lead the character to the end of all levels, but also, you have to move the way.

This game has an Editor. Here you can make your own levels!

If you're interested, you can also send your level to us. Simply by email X20000@outlook.de. If we like your level, we can use it for other players.

This game is made for the Jam "In SPACE!". https://itch.io/jam/in-space-jam
